articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Mitchell Marsh leaves Australia squad in the middle of World Cup; no return date - Hindustan Times
articles.description: "Mitchell Marsh has returned home from the ICC Men's World Cup for personal reasons. A timeline on his return to the squad is yet to be confirmed," said CA. | Cricket
articles.content: Australia all-rounder Mitchell Marsh has flown back home in the middle of the World Cup due to personal reasons. Marsh who flew to Perth on Wednesday is set to be unavailable for an indefinite period… [+2703 chars]
